programme.title: Deconstructing Carrie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E15, As Carrie reluctantly approaches her 35th birthday, Doug bribes neighborhood construction workers to hoot and holler at her in order to make her feel younger.

programme.title: Black List
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E16, Doug tries to find his roots when Deacon snubs him for a new black friend, and Carrie's manicurist refuses to see her.

programme.title: Wish Boned
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E17, Doug's elation at winning two tickets to the NCAA Final Four turns to guilt when Carrie prompts him to take Arthur instead of Deacon.

programme.title: Van Go
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E18, Holly is upset when she learns Carrie was using her to have access to her van; Doug has an argument with a waitress who takes too long to deliver his food.

programme.title: Ice Cubed
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E19, Carrie is overcome with guilt when she gets a digital music player for free because of the cashier's inattention.

programme.title: Catching Hell
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E20, Spence pretends to be Carrie's husband at a work event when a client finds Doug to be disagreeable; Arthur's upset he isn't the center of attention.

programme.title: Slippery Slope
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E21, When Carrie discovers that her and Doug's ski weekend getaway was motivated by a promotion for a free plasma TV that Doug wants, her romantic mood sours.

programme.title: Buy Curious
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E22, When their neighbor passes away, Carrie convinces Doug it would be a smart investment to buy the house and sell it for profit.

programme.title: Pole Lox
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E01, Doug convinces Carrie to take pole dancing lessons but is disappointed when she puts on a show for him.

programme.title: Vocal Discord
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E02, Carrie and Doug decide marriage counseling is in order and turn to their neighbor for help, but his techniques only make things worse.

programme.title: Consummate Professional
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E03, Carrie learns that in the beginning of their relationship Doug lied to her about getting a job at IPS so she would sleep with him.

programme.title: Like Hell
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E04, Doug tries to impress new driver Jared when he learns he was the only one at IPS not invited to Jared's barbecue.

programme.title: Sandwiched Out
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E05, The guys' neighborhood restaurant names a new sandwich after Deacon, so Doug determines to get some kind of food named after himself.

programme.title: Shear Torture
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E06, Carrie discovers that Doug's frequent trips to the hair salon are due to his attractive new hairstylist.

programme.title: Inn Escapable
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E07, Doug and Carrie's romantic getaway is a nightmare when the owners of the bed-and-breakfast become too much to take.

programme.title: Move Doubt
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E08, Doug and Carrie are confused when Deacon and Kelly are not interested in buying the house next door to theirs.

programme.title: G'night Stalker
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E09, Doug lets the attention go to his head when he gets anonymous e-mail from someone who saw him perform at a karaoke club.

programme.title: Raygin' Bulls
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E10, When Carrie goes on a trip with her father, Doug and his friend (Ray Romano) plan a guys night on the town.

programme.title: Baker's Doesn't
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E11, Doug and Carrie are roped into helping out at their church; Author and Spence try to cash in by writing a Christmas song.

programme.title: Fresh Brood
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E12, When Doug is not allowed to hold Danny's girlfriend's baby, Doug tries to persuade Carrie to have a child so he can get back at Danny.

programme.title: Gambling N'Diction
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E13, Doug tries to capitalize on his mother's poker skills by having her help him win a high-stakes tournament; Spence helps Carrie lose her accent.

programme.title: Apartment Complex
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E14, Doug and the guys secretly rent an apartment above their favorite Chinese restaurant; Carrie goes to extremes to keep her newest client, Kirstie Alley, happy.

programme.title: Buggie Nights
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E15, Bug-infested sheets force Doug and Carrie to hire an exterminator (Chris Elliott); Spence and Danny wrestle over vacation plans.

programme.title: Knee Jerk
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E16, Doug fakes being injured so that Carrie, who feels responsible, will continue to tend to his every need and allow him to miss a dreaded wedding.

programme.title: Present Tense
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E17, When the Heffernans receive an oil painting of themselves as an anniversary gift from Deacon and Kelly, they dislike the picture so much that they decide to stage a robbery rather than hang the painting in their home.

programme.title: Sold-Y Locks
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E18, Doug convinces Carrie to sell her hair so they can afford a cruise but finds he does not like her new, shorter style.

programme.title: Emotional Rollercoaster
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E19, Doug lies to Carrie about being accepted into the IPS management program; Doug tries to conquer a roller coaster that scared him as a child.

programme.title: Four Play
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E20, Doug realizes he has more in common with Deacon's wife than with Deacon, so he starts spending time with her.

programme.title: Hartford Wailer
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E21, Doug tries to be romantic by making an unexpected appearance at Carrie's company retreat; Danny and Spence sneak into a Huey Lewis concert.

programme.title: Fight Schlub
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E22, Doug plots revenge after learning that his friendship with a driver from a rival service was nothing more than a con.

programme.title: Acting Out
programme.desc: King of Queens, S08E23, Carrie wants to put Arthur in a retirement home after he starts a fire in the basement, but Doug makes a discovery that makes him want to change her mind.

programme.title: Mama Cast
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E01, When Carrie insists that Doug figure out how to invest their tax return, he buys an ice cream truck from a stranger.

programme.title: Affair Trade
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E02, Doug frantically tries to stop calls to his home from a woman who says she spent a romantic weekend with him.

programme.title: Moxie Moron
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E03, Doug takes on a supervisory role at IPS to prove to Carrie that he is not content with being a driver for the rest of his life.

programme.title: Major Disturbance
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E04, Doug tries to win back Major's love after he traumatizes the child while reading him a scary bedtime-story.

programme.title: Ruff Goin
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E05, Doug adopts a dog to impress the neighbors but soon regrets the decision; Arthur helps Danny with his gambling problem.

programme.title: Brace Yourself
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E06, A drawing by Deacon's son convinces Arthur that he needs braces; the Palmers hire Spence as a servant.

programme.title: Home Cheapo
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E07, Deacon and Kelly buy a vacation home, Carrie is upset because they could have easily afforded it, but they were too cheap.

programme.title: Offensive Foul
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E08, Carrie quickly tires of having to eat meat in private because of Doug forcing his new beliefs onto her.

programme.title: Mild Bunch
programme.desc: King of Queens, S09E09, Doug reunites with a high-school friend (Adam Sandler) who wants to relive some of their mischievous acts.

programme.title: Fortune and Men's Weight
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E17, Coach brings fortunes to Cheers when he buys an antique scale.

programme.title: Snow Job
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E18, Diane forbids Sam to go on an annual ski trip with his buddies.

programme.title: Coach Buries a Grudge
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E19, Coach is hurt when he learns that his deceased friend once propositioned his wife.

programme.title: Norman's Conquest
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E20, Norm tries to prove his manliness when his new client makes advances.

programme.title: I'll Be Seeing You (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E21, Sam hires a brilliant artist to paint Diane as a peace offering.

programme.title: I'll Be Seeing You (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E22, Diane defends her relationship with Sam to a slandering artist.

programme.title: Rebound (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E01, In the aftermath of their explosive separation, Sam has fallen off the wagon with a thud and has returned to his playboy ways, while Diane has just returned from a self-imposed rest at Golden Brook Sanitarium.

programme.title: Rebound (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E02, After several sessions with Dr. Frasier Crane, Sam is getting his life back in order, so Diane feels it's time to tell him the truth about her relationship with the psychiatrist.

programme.title: I Call Your Name
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E03, Sam gloats when he has reason to believe that Diane is still in love with him.

programme.title: Fairy Tales Can Come True
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E04, Frasier asks Sam to escort Diane to an event while he is out of town.

programme.title: Sam Turns The Other Cheek
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E05, Sam reaps the consequences of getting involved with a married woman.

programme.title: Coach In Love (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E06, Coach proposes marriage when he falls in love at first sight.

programme.title: Coach In Love (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E07, After Coach's girlfriend Irene wins the lottery, she becomes a socialite and breaks up with him.

programme.title: Diane Meets Mom
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E08, Frasier's mom threatens Diane's life when they meet for the first time.

programme.title: An American Family
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E09, Carla's ex-husband returns with his new bride, demanding custody of their oldest son. The normally feisty Carla shocks everyone at the bar when she agrees to the request.

programme.title: Diane's Allergy
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E10, After moving in with Frasier, Diane develops a chronic allergy and believes his beloved dog, Pavlov, causes it.

programme.title: Peterson Crusoe
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E11, Norm decides to live life to the fullest when he gets back his medical test results.

programme.title: A Ditch In Time
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E12, At the bar, Sam's innocent flirtation with an attractive customer, Amanda, gets him into trouble when he doesn't realize she's a member of Diane's therapy group.

programme.title: Whodunit
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E13, Carla wins the favor and admiration of Frasier's esteemed mentor.

programme.title: The Heart Is A Lonely Snipe Hunter
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E14, The guys pull a cruel joke on Frasier while they're on a fishing trip.

programme.title: King Of The Hill
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E15, Sam volunteers to play in a charity softball game against Playboy Playmates.

programme.title: Teacher's Pet
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E16, Sam gets Coach's help to help him pass a geography class and get his high school diploma. But he eventually finds an easier way to pass the course.

programme.title: The Mail Goes To Jail
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E17, Norm jeopardizes Cliff's job when he covers his route for a day.

programme.title: Bar Bet
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E18, An old bet forces Sam to choose between getting married or losing Cheers.

programme.title: Behind Every Great Man
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E19, An astute reporter visits Cheers and is turned off by Sam's arrogance.

programme.title: If I Ever Would Leave You
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E20, Nick returns to win back Carla's love when his new wife leaves him.

programme.title: The Executive's Executioner
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E21, Norm's forced to take a promotion that entails firing employees.

programme.title: Cheerio Cheers
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E22, With much trepidation, Diane decides to leave Cheers and travel to Europe with Frasier, who has been offered a temporary position at the University of Bologna.

programme.title: The Bartender's Tale
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E23, Carla hires an Englishwoman to fill Diane's place while she's in Europe.

programme.title: Bells Of St. Clete's
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E24, Carla takes revenge on her despised former high school principal.

programme.title: Rescue Me
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E25, In a cliff-hanging season finale, Frasier proposes to Diane while in Europe, wanting to get married the very next day.

programme.title: Birth, Death, Love And Rice
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E01, Frasier returns to Cheers with news that Diane joined a convent.

programme.title: Woody Goes Belly Up
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E02, Sam and Diane surprise Woody with a visit from his hometown girl.
